body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, steamboat operator and hotel keeper. Louisville native. Married Margaret T. Miller. Father of Margaret T. Miller, Lilian Miller, Mary Miller, and Tendia Miller. Operated steamboats on the Ohio River and Mississippi River between Louisville and New Orleans, Louisiana. Owned the Robert J. Ward in Louisville in partnership with Phillip King and George King. Owned and operated the Galt House hotel in Louisville.
